title: Ethereal Emerald & Diamond Raasi Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: adorned with Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
and South Sea Pearls. Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Raasi Haaram showcases intricate filigree work interspersed with vibrant Zambian Emeralds. The design draws inspiration from traditional South Indian motifs, reimagined for modern sensibilities. Delicate South Sea pearls cascade from the bottom section, adding a touch of ethereal beauty. The pendant displays exceptional craftsmanship with an elaborate floral motif, centered around a dazzling emerald.
colors: with striking accents of deep green (emeralds) and soft pearl white. This classic color combination is highly auspicious in South Indian traditions.
occasions: or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement. Can also be styled with contemporary outfits for a touch of regal elegance.
description: This Raasi Haaram is a symbol of timeless elegance and traditional South Indian artistry. The combination of high-quality diamonds, vibrant emeralds, and lustrous pearls makes it a truly unique piece. Its durable construction ensures it will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting brilliance. Owning this piece is not just acquiring jewelry; it's investing in a legacy.
